mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RoutineBoard(user_email , routine_brd_title, routine_brd_content , routine_cart_seq , image_open , gender_open , brd_image1 , brd_image2 , brd_start , brd_end , brd_rec ) VALUES( #{user_email}, #{routine_brd_title}, #{routine_brd_content}, #{routine_cart_seq}, #{image_open}, #{gender_open}, #{brd_image1}, #{brd_image2}, #{brd_start}, #{brd_end},#{brd_rec} )
